data: “What a beautiful Thanksgiving morning this is,” said the Rev. James A. Williams to his son Walter, as he looked out of the dining-room window.
"What a beautiful Thanksgiving morning this is," said the Rev. James A. Williams to his son Walter, as he looked out of the dining-room window.
